messages.subject: OT: Nicholas II in Japan
messages.msgSnippet: The Attempt on the Life of Nicholas II in Japan [[1891]] Adobe PDF file around 550 kb by George Alexander Lensen first page contains all necessary citation
messages.messageBody:
"The Attempt on the Life of Nicholas II in Japan" [[1891]]
Adobe PDF file around 550 kb
by George Alexander Lensen
first page contains all necessary citation info
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/NicholasIIinJapan.pdf
it's not directly related to the Shinsengumi so I didn't request to
have it stored at http://www.streamload.com/green_2
---------------------------------
Tama reminded me of the Jules Brunet connection in Hakodate/Hokkaido
and this goes back to what MissB had mentioned months ago about the
Jules Brunet + Hijikata connection...
I posted some links here
http://p076.ezboard.com/fshinsengumiheadquartersfrm17.showMessage?
topicID=67.topic

*interesting how this Frenchman was involved with Enomoto..but
his "character" was placed in the Seinan War (sigh) another example
of Hollywood at its "best"
